name: swagger-serverless
description: Projeto respons√°vel por armazenar todo backend da nova estrutura

scripts.deploy:dev: npm run deploy:dev --prefix src/embedDocPage/ && npm run deploy:dev --prefix src/infraestrutura && npm run deploy:dev --prefix src/static-page
scripts.deploy:test: npm run deploy:test --prefix src/embedDocPage/ && npm run deploy:test --prefix src/infraestrutura && npm run deploy:test --prefix src/static-page
scripts.deploy:prod: npm run deploy:prod --prefix src/embedDocPage/ && npm run deploy:prod --prefix src/infraestrutura && npm run deploy:prod --prefix src/static-page

hooks.pre-commit: npm run update-version package && rm -rf CHANGELOG.md && auto-changelog -p && git add CHANGELOG.md package.json package-lock.json && lint-staged
hooks.post-commit: npm run update-version tag && git push --tags
